name: @redis-x/client
description: Enhanced redis client build on top of "redis" package.

scripts.build: bun run build:commands && bun run build:ts && bun run build:cjs
scripts.build:commands: bun run compiler/main.ts && bunx eslint src/client.ts --fix && bunx eslint src/transaction.ts --fix
scripts.build:ts: rm -rf dist/esm types ; tsc && biome format --fix dist/esm
scripts.publish:npm: bun run build && bun run lint && bun run test && npm publish
scripts.redis:up: docker ps | grep test-redis >/dev/null || docker run --rm -d -p 16379:6379 --name test-redis redis:7-alpine
scripts.test: export REDIS_PORT=16379 ; bun run redis:up && npm run test:vitest && bun test --coverage

author: Daniil Kirichenko (https://twitter.com/kirickme)
